author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/bx3tj (compensated affiliate link) - 8bitdo has been branching out into different types of peripherals, including  mechanical keyboards and now they are getting into mice with the R8 gaming mouse. The only thing retro about it is the NES color scheme but it's otherwise modern. See more 8bitdo : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIt2qhI5w4F0TJj9zOkXKABa and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
